name: Inforonics
tag_list: it, it-support, it-consulting, tech-support-outsourcing, application-management, infrastructure-management
overview: Inforonics helps its clients succeed with solutions to their business and technology challenges. As a service warranty assurance partner, Inforonics designs and delivers solutions that measure and improve the performance, capacity, security and availability of the services delivered by its clients. Inforonicsâ€™ suite of offerings blends technology (on-site or on-demand), expertise, (training, staffing, consulting, technical support, IT operations center, vendor selection and management) and proven processes (ITIL, MOF, CoBIT, ISO, CMM) that protect and preserve the business value of IT services. Based in MA, Inforonics has been a privately-held company for over 45 years. For more information, visit www.inforonics.com.

milestones.description: Inforonics management buys company, becomes Inforonics Global Services
milestones.source_description: Inforonics management buys company, becomes Inforonics Global Services
